entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued July 02 at 1:02PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Near Record Warm Temperatures Could Bring High River Levels... A heat wave arrives later this week causing temperatures to soar into the upper 70s and 80s. entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDowell County through 400 PM EDT...
